Author: s3191998s
Text: Oof. I feel this. My life is also falling apart and just making me that more obsessed with my ed. I think for me it’s just something to put all of my attention to so I don’t have to think about everything else that going to shit.

Author: phenethylabean
Text: i feel this. when things get worse i take solace in the fact that i’m restricting at a high deficit. it’s awful. i used to be really bothered by hunger pains but now they are comforting to me. i’m sorry you are feeling similarly.
